entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except east 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16 except minus 10 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind light except east 40 km/h near the Richardson mountains. High minus 16 except minus 10 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023
